title: Generate a Component
description: Learn to generate complete UI components from descriptions. Claude can scaffold components quickly.

initialFiles.content:
# Challenge: Generate a Component

Generate a complete React component from a description.

## Objectives
1. Generate a UserCard component
2. It should display: avatar, name, email, role badge
3. Include basic styling

bonusObjectives.description: Add CSS styles for the card

hints.text: Describe the component in detail: what props it takes, what it displays, and its structure.
Try: 'Create a UserCard component that takes avatar, name, email, and role props. Display as a card with the avatar image, name, email, and a colored role badge.'

Ask: 'Create UserCard.jsx: a React component with props (avatar: string, name: string, email: string, role: 'admin'|'user'). Show avatar image, name as heading, email below, and role as a colored badge. Add CSS to styles.css.'

solution.approach: Describe the component structure and props in detail.
solution.example: Generate a UserCard component with avatar, name, email, and role badge
alternativeApproaches: Start with a basic card, then add features
Generate with inline styles vs separate CSS

learningPoints: Specify props, structure, and styling needs
Claude can generate complete, working components
